text: The Chechen Republic of Ichkeria (; ; ; shortened to "ChRI" or "CRI") was a country that declared independence from Russia and controlled most of the former Checheno-Ingush ASSR from 1991 to 2000. It became a part of Russia during the Second Chechen War. == Notes == == References == Category:Chechnya
title: Chechen Republic of Ichkeria
